name: General Levy
description: '''Paul Scott Levy''' (born 28 April 1971), also known as '''General Levy''', is an English [[ragga]] [[Disc jockey#reggae|deejay]], regularly employed on studio tracks by [[drum and bass]] DJs. He is best known for the track "[[Incredible (M-Beat song)|Incredible]]" which he recorded with [[M-Beat]]. A remixed version of this reached number eight on the [[UK singles chart]] in 1994.
